jaddon.jupdate

Class JUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • jaddon.jupdate.JUpdater

  • public class JUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object to update your programm with an own selected server

    • Constructor Detail

      • JUpdater

        public JUpdater(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String version)
        This constructs the object
        Parameters:
        name - String Name from your project
        version - String Current version from your project, dont have to be the newest!

      • JUpdater

        public JUpdater(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String version,
                boolean start,
                java.lang.String... urls)
        This constructs the object
        Parameters:
        name - String Name from your project
        version - String Current version from your project, dont have to be the newest!
        start - Boolean If the program should start instant, you need this to be false, if you want to set custom URLs
        urls - String Custom URLs (1. Test File, 2. Files Folder, 3. Updater Folder)

      • JUpdater

        public JUpdater(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String version,
                boolean start,
                java.io.File tempFolder,
                java.lang.String... urls)
        This constructs the object
        Parameters:
        name - String Name from your project
        version - String Current version from your project, dont have to be the newest!
        start - Boolean If the program should start instant, you need this to be false, if you want to set custom URLs
        tempFolder - File Folder for the temp files
        urls - String Custom URLs (1. Test File, 2. Files Folder, 3. Updater Folder)

        Parameters:
